snippet: There is no doubt that Helmand Central Prison in Afghanistan is impressive, but the only question is how long it will stay that way once Western forces leave and Western money dwindles.
abstract: Lashkar Gah Journal; Helmand Central Prison in Lashkar Gah, Afghanistan, is impressive modern facility that is clean and well-maintained, offering array of services to inmates, but question is how long it will stay that way once Western forces leave and Western money dwindles.
lead_paragraph: There is no doubt that Helmand Central Prison in Afghanistan is impressive, but the only question is how long it will stay that way once Western forces leave and Western money dwindles.

headline.seo: A Pristine Afghan Prison Faces a Murky Future
headline.main: A Pristine Afghan Prison Faces a Murky Future
headline.print_headline: A Pristine Afghan Prison Faces a Murky Future
